title: Itadaki-Zen
typeOfFood: Vegan, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Vegan Japanese restaurant in the heart of King's Cross. Emphasis is on organic ingredients and seasonally grown vegetables. Rice, root vegetables, seaweeds, soya beans and soy by-products, are recurrent ingredients in the cuisine. Also art gallery and weekend live music events. Last seating 9:15pm. Accepts credit cards in the evening. Lunch is cash only.
